message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $15000.  I believe it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and I understand you have a budget.  I'm willing to come down to $13500.  This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $12500. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
